mdRecord.dcterms:title: Post War Correspondence to Dr. C. M. Stigleman at Jacksonville, from Saml J. Mullins at Martinsville
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Post war correspondence to Dr. C. M. Stigleman at Jacksonville, from Saml J. Mullins at Martinsville, Va. Subject: Peter Mullins and Annie Lee Stigleman. Note: Annie Lee Stigleman daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Stigleman married Dr. Peter Mullins son of Mr. and Mrs. Samuel Jessie Mullins. 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
